testcase.name: should be able to register a new user
Create new article and validate article appears in feed
Edit an article and validate changed article text
Update headline headline and verify change
Add a Follower user and verify following count increases by one
Remove the Follower user and verify following count decreases by one
Search for Only One Article Like This and verify only one article shows, and verify the author
Navigate to the profile view, Update the users email and verify
Update the users zipcode and verify
Update the users password and verify
